Dietary badge pattern for menu item classification
Empty state pattern with clear filters option
Loading skeleton pattern for better UX during data loading

shadcn/ui design pattern consistency across components

Cart integration requires proper state management to avoid conflicts
Empty state messaging needs to be clear and action-oriented
